title: Go save $50 on Apple’s massive 140W charger right now
content:
Macworld

Keeping your devices charged and ready to go is essential, but nowadays, most tech products don’t come with power adapters anymore, including the iPads and iPhones Apple sells. Even if you don’t need one, this 140W Apple USB-C power adapter is on sale right now for $50, a great price for the most powerful power adapter Apple sells.

This slim power adapter from Apple delivers a ton of power. In fact, 140W is more than enough to recharge even the power-hungry MacBook Pro laptops and the only capable of fast-charging the 16-inch MacBook Pro. One of the best things about this particular Apple charger is that it comes with foldable prongs so it won’t scratch your devices while moving around in there.

Just note: The power adapter doesn’t come with a cable, however, so you’re going to pick up a USB-C cable that can handle 140W charging. But since you’re saving $50, you’ll still walk away with a bundle of cash in your pocket. So, go grab this 140W USB-C power adapter before they run out or the sale ends.

Get this 140W power adapter for a great price
Buy now at Woot
